body: So Futaba is now a young mother, nice
@Jndlel_Kun of course everyone knows that Igor is best girl

My advice to anyone who has yet to even play Persona 5, Don't look at Doujins until you have beaten it once (that means you go for the true ending), I set myself that rule while I was playing it and I do highly recommend doing just that. Some of the persona 5 Doujinshi  I have read go over some major plot points (Futaba's existence is one of them). Other than that this is a good doujin (Igor is the best waifu there is anyway...).
This is the cutest thing I've ever seen.
